ClassDecl.Name: CharAtt
ClassDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> Represents the extra information of a character to display. </summary> </Document>

VarDecl.Name: rightOffset
VarDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> The distance from the head of the line to the right side of this character in pixel. </summary> </Document>

VarDecl.Name: colorIndex
VarDecl.Document: <Document> <summary> The color index of the character. Use <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement::GetColors()@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> and <links><link cref="::vl::presentation::elements::GuiColorizedTextElement::SetColors(& const ColorArray)@s:vl.presentation.elements.GuiColorizedTextElement" /></links> to access the color table. </summary> </Document>
